# Ascent Group Construction - AI/LLM Site Map

## Site Overview
Ascent Group Construction is Ontario's prime specialty contractor for building envelope and restoration services, serving the Greater Toronto Area since 2009.

## Core Company Information
- **Company Name**: Ascent Group Construction
- **Founded**: 2009
- **Location**: Greater Toronto Area, Ontario, Canada
- **Type**: Specialty Contractor (Building Envelope & Restoration)
- **Service Areas**: Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Markham, and across Ontario
- **Contact**: info@ascentgroupconstruction.com | +1-647-123-4567
- **Website**: https://ascentgroupconstruction.com

## Primary Services
1. **Building Envelope Services**
   - Façade Remediation & Restoration
   - EIFS (Exterior Insulation Finishing Systems) Installation & Repair
   - Sealant Replacement Programs
   - Waterproofing Solutions
   - Window & Door Restoration

2. **Masonry Services**
   - Masonry Restoration & Repair
   - Brick & Stone Work
   - Concrete Repair
   - Tuckpointing & Repointing

3. **Parking Garage Restoration**
   - Structural Concrete Repairs
   - Waterproofing Systems
   - Traffic Coatings
   - Joint Sealant Replacement

4. **Specialty Coatings**
   - Protective Coatings Application
   - Stucco Repair & Refinishing
   - Painting Services
   - Surface Preparation

## Markets Served
- **Commercial Construction**: Office buildings, retail spaces, industrial facilities
- **Multi-Family Residential**: Condominiums, apartment buildings, housing complexes
- **Institutional**: Schools, universities, hospitals, government buildings
- **Healthcare**: Hospitals, clinics, long-term care facilities
- **Hospitality**: Hotels, resorts, restaurants
- **Education**: Schools, colleges, universities
- **Retail**: Shopping centers, stores, restaurants

## Key Differentiators
- 15+ years of industry experience
- Self-performed core trades (no subcontractors for envelope work)
- WSIB certified and fully insured ($5M liability)
- Licensed across the Greater Toronto Area
- 500+ successfully completed projects
- 95% on-time completion rate
- Benjamin Moore and Sherwin-Williams authorized contractor
- 24/7 emergency response services
- Design-build capabilities

## Site Navigation Structure

### Main Navigation
- **Home** (/) - Company overview, services, recent projects
- **Services** (/services) - Detailed service catalog
- **Projects** (/projects) - Portfolio of completed work
- **Company** (/company) - About us, team, mission, values
- **Insights** (/insights) - Industry blog, news, resources
- **Contact** (/contact) - Contact form, locations, hours

### Services Pages
- Building Envelope (/services/building-envelope)
- Façade Restoration (/services/facade-restoration)
- Parking Garage Restoration (/services/parking-garage-restoration)
- EIFS Services (/services/eifs)
- Masonry Repair (/services/masonry)
- Waterproofing (/services/waterproofing)
- Sealant Replacement (/services/sealant-replacement)

### Market-Specific Pages

- Education Construction (/markets/education)
- Hospitality Construction (/markets/hospitality)

- Privacy Policy (/privacy)

- Accessibility (/accessibility)

## Common Questions & Answers

**Q: What areas does Ascent Group Construction serve?**
A: We serve the entire Greater Toronto Area including Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Markham, and across Ontario.

**Q: What types of projects does Ascent specialize in?**
A: We specialize in building envelope and restoration work including façade remediation, parking garage restoration, EIFS repair, masonry restoration, and waterproofing for commercial, multi-family, and institutional projects.

**Q: Is Ascent Group Construction licensed and insured?**
A: Yes, we are fully licensed, WSIB certified, and carry $5M liability insurance coverage.

**Q: How long has Ascent been in business?**
A: Ascent Group Construction was founded in 2009 and has over 15 years of experience in the construction industry.

**Q: Does Ascent use subcontractors?**
A: For our core envelope and restoration services, we self-perform the work with our trained crews rather than using subcontractors.

**Q: What is the typical project timeline?**
A: Project timelines vary based on scope, but we maintain a 95% on-time completion rate and provide detailed schedules during the proposal phase.

**Q: Does Ascent offer emergency services?**
A: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency response services throughout the Greater Toronto Area with same-day assessment.

**Q: What warranties does Ascent provide?**
A: We offer comprehensive workmanship warranties and use premium materials backed by manufacturer warranties from Benjamin Moore and Sherwin-Williams.

## Project Portfolio Highlights
- 500+ completed projects across the GTA
- Commercial office buildings
- Multi-family residential complexes
- Institutional facilities
- Healthcare facilities
- Educational institutions
- Hospitality venues
- Retail spaces

## Certifications & Credentials
- WSIB Certified Contractor
- Licensed Building Envelope Contractor Ontario
- Benjamin Moore Authorized Contractor
- Sherwin-Williams Authorized Contractor
- $5M Liability Insurance Coverage
- OSHA Certified Crews
- Zero-Incident Safety Record

## Technology Stack (for web crawlers)
- React + TypeScript frontend
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- Semantic HTML5
- Schema.org structured data
- Open Graph protocol
- Accessibility compliant (WCAG 2.1)
